title: Why Everyone Suddenly Loves Socks
author: Nia Bloom
summary: Once overlooked, socks are now stealing the spotlight on runways and sidewalks.
content: From neon colors to mismatched patterns, socks are having their moment. Fashionistas are flaunting them with heels, sandals, and even formalwear. Who knew comfort and flair could be such a powerful combo?

title: Can You Survive a Week in Denim Everything?
author: Theo Lema
summary: We dared one writer to wear only denim for seven days. Here's what happened.
content: Spoiler: denim-on-denim isn’t just for cowboys. From jeans to denim hats, the experiment revealed just how versatile (and sometimes sweaty) denim can be. Would they do it again? Probably not.

title: 5 Outfits Inspired by Your Favorite Breakfast Foods
author: Zara Mekonnen
summary: Dress like avocado toast and still look cute? Absolutely.
content: We styled five outfits based on classic breakfast items. Think cozy browns for coffee, soft whites for eggs, and sunny yellows for OJ. Fashion has never been so deliciously inspired.

title: The Great Hat Comeback of 2025
author: Leo Assefa
summary: Berets, bucket hats, and even top hats are trending again. Are you ready?
content: Hats are no longer just sun protection — they're statements. Whether it's cottagecore berets or retro bucket hats, people are topping off their outfits with flair (and a bit of shade).

title: What Your Shoes Say About Your Personality
author: Hana Yonas
summary: Are you a sneakerhead or a silent loafer? Your shoes might be spilling your secrets.
content: Fashion psychologists (yes, that’s a thing) say your footwear reflects more than style. Boots mean you're bold. Crocs? A rebel. High heels? You like to suffer — fashionably.
